snippet.title: CLeM - Official Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
CLeM releases on February 6th, 2024 on Steam, Nintendo Switch, Epic, and GOG!

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1861440/CLeM/

CLeM is a narrative-driven puzzle adventure game with a dark twist. Wake up in a world where puzzles intertwine with exploration, weaving a unique narrative rooted in alchemy. A voice awakens you. It gives you purpose. To guide you, you find a notebook with mysterious entries and a house to explore.

Stay up to date with the developers, Mango Protocol: 

Youtube: @MangoProtocol 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mangoprotocol
Discord: https://discord.gg/KrR3dhzDH3
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MangoProtocol
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mango_protocol
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mangoprotocol/

Stay up to date with the publishers, Iceberg Interactive: 

Discord: http://discord.gg/iceberginteractive
Official website: https://www.iceberg-games.com/
Steam publisher page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam
